title: Ranked question
body: I recently just got lvl 30 and I already played 3/2 ranked games, do I still have a chance of getting to gold? ;_;

replies.body: Just all depends on your MMR but I think you it's not easy to get gold in your first provisionals. But just land in whatever league and climb the ladder from there :)
I have only known Summoners to get gold from going 10/0(on very first promos)
You can land in gold straight after promos.
if u win the next 5 its possible, but most likely silver 1 or lower
